sentences.english: But he will not be remembered as a martyr.

sentences.english: Yours will be the ineffable joy of quaffing the cup of martyrdom for His sake.
sentences.chinese: 你得到的將是暢飲爲祂殉道的莫名歡樂之杯。

sentences.english: In John 21, Jesus told Peter that he would die a martyr’s death.
sentences.chinese: 在約翰福音第21章，主耶穌告訴彼得他殉道而死。

sentences.english: Great persecutors are recruited among martyrs whose heads haven't been cut off.

sentences.english: Peter was crucified upside down on an x-shaped cross.
sentences.chinese: 彼得是倒掛在十字架上殉道的。

sentences.english: Reyes said the saint’s martyrdom became a symbol of faith in God.
sentences.chinese: 雷耶斯蒙席說，聖李樂倫的殉道變成了信賴主的標記。

sentences.english: Well,according to developing Christian ideas, martyrs didn't have to wait for the resurrection.
sentences.chinese: 根據發展中的基督教義，殉道者不必等待復活。

sentences.english: Acts 8:1-4,this takes place right after the stoning of Stephen.
sentences.chinese: 使徒行傳第8章1至4節，講的是司提反殉道之後。

sentences.english: They eventually became martyrs and even saints together.
sentences.chinese: 他們最終一起殉道，一起被封聖。

sentences.english: Ignatius can even claim,for himself,the status that he, especially to his martyrdom is the Word of God.
sentences.chinese: 伊格那丟甚至自稱，自己的殉道是上帝的話語。

sentences.english: She wanted to honor the relics of the martyrs and visit their graves down in the catacombs.
sentences.chinese: 她也想恭敬殉道者的聖髑，拜訪他們位於地下的陵墓。
